text.section:
The Secretary periodically shall audit a sample of instances of contractual employment in the various units to determine whether:
justification exists in each instance to continue certification for the contractual employee; and
the guidelines adopted under § 13-203 of this subtitle have been followed.

section.section:
If, as a result of an audit, the Secretary determines that services performed by a contractual employee should be performed by a permanent employee, the Secretary shall:
refuse to renew the certification for the contractual employee; and
recommend that a position for a permanent employee be established.

If, as a result of an audit, the Secretary determines that a unit has not complied with the guidelines adopted under § 13-203 of this subtitle, the Secretary shall:
advise the unit of the nature of the noncompliance; and
suggest alternate criteria or methods that would have complied with the guidelines.
